Text: I had the privilege of working with Abdel during his time at RBI as we implemented CloudFix solutions across their cloud infrastructure. Abdel's technical expertise and strategic vision were exceptional - he personally automated over $500K in annual savings and drove approximately $1.5 million in total cost reductions during our time working together. What impressed me most was how efficiently he adopted CloudFix's recommendations, implementing them faster and more thoroughly than almost any other customer I've worked with. His valuable technical feedback has continued to shape our product development to this day. Abdel's deep understanding of cloud architecture, combined with his practical approach to cost optimization, created a partnership that benefited both organizations. His work at RBI stands as a perfect example of how the right expertise can maximize the potential of cost optimization tools

I hired Zoe to provide me with an updated template for a web CMS - she responded quickly to the initial request and was proactive in providing new design concepts. Once we got started she delivered quickly and effectively. I'd be happy to work with her again or to recommend her to others!

I worked with Aileen for 8 years at Scapa. I found her to be a helpful and responsive colleague, as well as being an excellent developer. We worked on customer sites with many disparate needs and Aileen was always able to provide help to sort out the problems at hand, as well as keeping current with new and ever developing technologies.     On a personal note, I was very friendly with Aileen, despite having to move furniture up to her top floor flat.

During the short time we worked together I was very impressed by Steven's articulacy and analytical skills. He was able to deliver complex sales messages in a lucid fashion, and is very motivated to succeed.
